item.title: Code help plz look
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

I have made this code but if i change my thieving to 1 i will get skill cape why?

if(NPCID == 2270){
if(playerLevel[17] < 99){
addItem(2710 ,1);
if(NPCID == 2270) {
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(2270), 4884);
sendFrame126(“There you go, enjoy you Thieving skill cape.”, 4885);
sendFrame126(“Click here to continue.”, 4886);
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
sendFrame75(2270, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
} else {
if(NPCID == 2270) {
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(2270), 4884);
sendFrame126(“Sorry you need 99 Thieving to get a skill cape.”, 4885);
sendFrame126(“Click here to continue.”, 4886);
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
sendFrame75(2270, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
}
}
}
}

Read full topic
